name: HalloweenTrickorTreatingMystery
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halloween trick or treat
Developer Terms of Use
des: Go on a virtual trick-or-treating adventure with Alexa. Travel to Candy Hollow to solve a Halloween mystery - all while knocking on doors and interacting with a fun cast of characters. Feel free to wear your costumes and don’t forget to grab some candy! This skill is targeted towards children in elementary school.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
